documents.document:
May you live in interesting times.
#2017
Discovering too late that in this case bright = glittery https://t.co/61HxR1P4MP
There are no longer any @Buseireann buses that go straight there. Going to Ballina & hoping for a lift can take anywhere between 3 and 6 hrs
Gah. Booking a week in advance, for myself +1 to get to Castlebar for a family dinner next weekend by train would cost min. â‚¬80
I really like @NoshingtonCafe, except that their art is mostly either serious-looking famous male actors or anonymous naked/sexualised women
Also also all of the personality cultishness
@ColinJM I tried hard not to think too much about it but it sells itself too hard on the talent fantasy.
Also WHERE ARE ALL THE FEMALE PLAYERS?
Musicians are (generally) not freaks and masochists, they need the same kinds of learning environments as anyone else No theory ever?
Focussing on one weirdly specific style to the exclusion of ALL OTHER MUSIC Obsession with one famous figure Lack of musical context

Including: Speed â‰ excellence Physical injury and pain from overplaying â‰ sign of hard work and progress
#Whiplash
Finally watched Whiplash. It was enjoyable. But I have, well, a few problems with it.
Friday night blooming flower tea https://t.co/haUzwPjJrr

Though I shudder to imagine the technical wake-up that will be my first lesson... plus the noises my joints make.
#rustyhinges
Feeling closer than ever to picking up playing piano again (or any other instrument). Just a little further to go with right shoulder
Well played @Kathbum https://t.co/kLi3Jmz8AU
<-- Changed my photo and cover image, cos procrastinating.
Spending some time today with Emily Dickinson

Looking for good (in-ear) earphones for about the â‚¬60-100 mark.
Used to always go Sennheiser but they keep breaking.
Maybe Sony?

I accidentally came into work an hour early today.
Very confused as to how I did that.

@DelilahSDawson @GreatDismal at least two of those sound like they're from @doctorow's Someone Comes to Town...
Or have I missed sth?

Loving finding places I recognise in #Fallout4. Great worldbuilding in these games, even if you don't know the cities they're based in
Compiling annual reports for the @AIC_ie AGM this Saturday. Glad we reached a lot of intended goals for this year.

Just got all my inbox counts down to 0. Admittedly by selecting all then clicking 'mark as read'.
Still counts right?
@IndeedSupport hi I keep getting emails about someone who has signed up to your site but evidently has given my address. How to fix?
Looking back over some notes from a meeting yesterday, I see I mis-transcribed a task as "Find clarity"
@williewhite @DubTheatreFest Thanks!
@williewhite Hi there. Just wondering if @DubTheatreFest take project proposals, and if so, where should they go? Thanks

@marcyeats @AliNAskin @SteinbergMedia agreed. I've begun exporting bits of score as graphics then using GIMP/photoshop to reconstitute!
Oh, is the grand inaugurism happening now? I'll look away.

@steveohrourke oh oh oh! I thought I was the only one. I make Jamie do basically all necessary household-related phone calls.

The fact that you maneouvred so obviously to be walking behind me after getting off the bus didn't go unnoticed either
Sorry obviously-high guy trying to talk to me in a dark dodgy place, I'm sure you are "actually a nice guy" but I'm going to walk away now.

First experiment with new matcha kit a success. And delicious.

Totally caught a snorlax yesterday. #polishesnailsonlapel
@EoinMadsen it took me a long time to accept that being 'up' or at least on an even keel was real and not just drug-induced.
@EoinMadsen I hope that optimism will come to be true for you eventually like it did for me.
@EoinMadsen I always found that to the cruelest part, that hope and optimism...until eventually the swings began to even out.

This week a stomach bug segued straight into a bad head cold.
#myfaceithurts

@SSComposer Why, is it not good?? I have been looking forward to it for months! No Mac version yet though :(
